capsules_submitted.utterance: So Neville is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about the new Harry Potter exhibit and they mentioned that McGonagall's eyes are actually depicted with square lenses in some of the artwork. I completely agree, I've seen it myself and it's really interesting to note how the artists chose to represent her character like that.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of square lenses before, valeria   that's really interesting! what can you tell me about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall looks great with those square-lenses. I'm quite certain about it, and I have to say, she's really rocking the look.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria told me that mcgonagall wears square lenses.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool, I mean, who wouldn't want to have a pair of magical lenses that can see through disguises and detect hidden potions? But, I guess some people might find them a bit intimidating or unusual.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of personality does mcgonagall have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm certain of it. He seems really confident about his age, and I think it's great that he knows exactly how old he is.
So, I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old. That's still pretty young, right? (sentiment: neutral)
So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old, right? That's really young. (sentiment: surprise)
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old. Honestly, I'm not really sure about his interests anymore, but I think he's still into sports. (CERTAINTY: medium) (POLARITY: neutral) (SENTIMENT: neutral) (EMOTION: calm)

So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old, right? That's still pretty young, but I think it's great that he's at an age where he can learn so many new things. I'm not sure if I'd be as curious as he is at his age, but I guess that's what makes him so special!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. you're 11 years old, what's your name?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm glad to see that Hagrid is still affiliated with Hogwarts. He's been a great support for the students and staff there over the years. I've always admired his dedication to teaching Care of Magical Creatures.
